page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content:
The Regal Cinema on Carlton Road provides a varied programme of films on two screens. One screen is usually devoted to family films, whilst the other caters for the latest releases.
Nightclub and disco facilities are provided in the town. There are many restaurants covering a wide variety of ethnic tastes. 'Take-away' restaurants abound.
Worksop has a variety of pubs catering for all tastes from those offering entertainment to those retaining the character of the town and 'real ale'.
The nearest theatre is in Sheffield, some 20 miles away.
